<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Propeller Attachment](/Feats.aspx?ID=3136) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 54</row>

**Archetype** [Trapsmith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=111)

**Prerequisites**
[Trapsmith Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3134); Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You've mastered attaching clockwork propellers to your daily quick-deploy [snares](/equipment/snares) that use gears. This allows you to place your snares in the air or underwater, where they remain in place for up to 10 minutes, after which the propeller runs out of power and they fall or sink. Unless you use additional precautions to hide it, a propeller snare's location is usually obvious.
name: Propeller Attachment
